name: New field added in a standard record must be at the end of the record (PeopleSoft)
description:
This rules reports records having new fields added not placed at the end of the record.
The property compared is recordFieldNum.
output:
This report lists all Records that contain added fields before a standard field. It provides the following information:
- Records full name,
- Added Fields full name
rationale: New field added in a standard record must be at the end of the record.
remediation:
New field added in a standard record must be done in a specific <KEY> sub-record, always at the end of the record; except when the last field have type long, then add the new field before this field.
For new record, it's not mandatory to add a specific sub-record. You can add a standard sub-record to a new record.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Records with added fields (MODIFIED)
alternativeName: New field added in a standard record must be at the end of the record (PeopleSoft)
